title: the game kick me out and give me afk
body:
my game went disappear when its loading, and pop out a sign about " your game has ended, feel free to play a NEW GAME" when it's only 2 min
pass through. after i relogin to the game and it give me afk even though the sign said "FEEL FREE TO PLAY NEW GAME." why is this happening? this is insane.

replies.body:
It sounds like there may have been a connection error in reaching the gameserver. Since this is most often caused by problematic local settings, I'd recommend you check out our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to address potential causes for this.

Let me know if this helped.

yeah feel free to suck it riot this is the 2nd time i have been penalized with ask bans, because your client is find over the community. its also the 2nd time i get told tough luck and sorry not sorry keep playing through the ban penalties though.

If you are having more disconnects than 98% of the community (and fewer than that get leaver-buster penalties), then you really need to deal with your connection issues.  Leaver-buster is just trying to give you some nudges in that direction so you take action.  Riot has some decent walkthroughs of common problems.

It sounds like the disconnection ended up as a remake, which is what the notification was mentioning.  The message won't necessarily consider your status with [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ).  Leaverbuster also wont' happen on your account with just on game, so you'd need to have a history of leaves.  It's really important to get that resolved, so let me know if I can offer any technical assistance!
